name: search_wikihow
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool wiki_briefs.
Tool description: Briefs about anything you search. No need to read lengthy articles, we summarize.
API description: Searches for a 'how-to' question on WikiHow and returns summarized methods and steps.

q.description: A 'how-to' question to search on WikiHow, e.g., 'find meaning in life', 'learn any language', 'play soccer', 'change an oil filter'.
